Required Changes: Multiple critical issues identified including: 1) Missing data integrity constraints (PRIMARY KEY, FOREIGN KEY, NOT NULL constraints), 2) Performance optimization missing (clustering keys for large tables), 3) Data type precision issues (NUMBER fields lack precision and scale specifications), 4) Data governance gaps (missing PII masking policies, data classification labels), 5) Missing default values for audit fields, 6) No comprehensive data validation rules, 7) Missing table-level comments for documentation, 8) No partitioning strategy for time-series data, 9) Missing search optimization service configuration, 10) No data retention policies definition.
